the soup standing time will be almost over it needs a few minutes to thicken up take a tablespoon of the broth and a tablespoon of water add the veggies and the liquid to a big bowl toss the veggies in the liquid and microwave for about minute seconds when through dump the soup and noodles on top and you have a delicious healthy meal the men in my office come around when the aroma of the soup comes out of the microwave several are now also fans despite being initially worried by the fact that the meal is vegan when i am enough to remember to wash and bring it in i add a spring onion on top i just use an office scissors to cut it if you can afford the calories a few drops of toasted sesame oil is a nice addition as well as is yummy

Review: as i was growing up my mother always made apple sauce cake for every birthday and special occasion after i was diagnosed with celiac i began trying to make a cake that was like the one my mother made after years i gave up trying then i saw this mix in the store years ago and got very excited with the when i make the cake i the mix recipe a little i add to the dry mix cup coco cup chopped walnuts and raisins i use large eggs cup apple sauce cup of oil and cup water instead of what is listed on the bag this cake and the chocolate cake mix also made by are our family favorites this includes my husband and children who are not celiac and are very picky eaters

i served this wonderful cake at a christmas party at my house as the only celiac in the crowd i decided to wait until the others had tried it before that it was gluten free everyone raved over the great taste the package included directions for making the mix into a carrot cake which is how i served it my own two boys said it was the best cake i had ever made including the traditional wheat flour cakes i sometimes make for the rest of my family it was moist spicy and rich it reminded me of the cakes my grandmother made when i was growing up and she was a terrific cook i highly recommend this one

Review: this is a delicious recipe and ingredients and the one i use a bit pricy but if you do not mind the price point it makes a wonderful waffle combine this with a waring waffle maker and you could be in waffle heaven

Review: the label asks for tbsp of melted butter which i never use that much when i use the red mill pancake mix i could only make two perfect round pancakes from it even though it claims the serving should be pancakes the pancake is indeed fluffy as others claimed in the review however i also tasted a lot of chemicals in it i guess one reason it is so fluffy is a lot of baking soda in the ingredient looking at the ingredient label did i realize it has more chemicals than other brands and i do not understand what artificial flavor it has to be added in when this pancake mix is just the normal type with no fancy flavors like cinnamon and apple etc br br in short i am going back to my red mill brand at least i know what i am digesting in my stomach

i use this as the base for my waffles use small bananas mashed t t vanilla and cup pecans and then blend it all together you need to let it cook a much longer period of time at a lower then normal temperature and you need to cut back on the amount of water used you need to know what the consistency of the waffle mixture should be before you attempt this recipe so that you can determine the amount of water to use this is a somewhat tricky recipe since it is easy for the waffles to stick and pull apart one banana makes it easier but i have had some success with three bananas banana are better

Review: do not contain preservatives or additives therefore they must be properly stored all coca tea air tight bags are re with zip lock and once opened the bags must be kept closed at all time to avoid contamination in a dry cool dark place away from strong flavored foods an extra airtight container is recommended when the tea is stored over one month br do not store coca tea products inside a refrigerator if you have produce inside many fruits and vegetables especially if they have been damaged give off ethylene gas as they coca tea bags are very sensitive to the presence of even very low levels of ethylene gas the refrigerator acts as a trap for the ethylene gas given off by the varieties allowing it to build up to damaging levels although not to humans the ethylene gas leads to the early and rotting of the tea

Review: a classic example of a very poorly designed and likely gluten free product it lacks enough sugar and moisture ingredients to make the finished product taste good and mix well as with many gluten free products new to the market you find yourself constantly adding something to try to make it right to these i had to add nearly a full cup of sugar to begin to the very bitter taste i added both applesauce and plain yogurt during different baking sessions to get a consistency that would feel and move like a muffin mix this mix takes too much doctoring to be recommended at all until hodgson mill goes back to the board and fixes this but hodgson mill does have other good products try their blueberry muffin mix and hope that one day amazon will carry a of their gluten free offerings as many are very very good

pure breed gsd and had problems for years with upset stomach eating grass and throwing up in the morning and then would not eat as her stomach was too upset it finally on me that due to throwing up in the am was that the food was not staying with her i even tried feeding her before going to bed at night and still did not work i tried evo and i could not believe the change she does not get us up at night to go outside she was having bowel movements every day and now she has or sometimes i have had her on the evo large bites for almost a year now and she has not been sick once it is the higher protein in this food that stays with her longer and has made all of our lives so much better thank you thank you evo

i have been feeding my gsd the red meat formula for about months and all i can say is wow before i started him on this food he had problems with skin allergies and being picky about food although the price for this food is a little it is worth the price you feed about half the amount you normally would since its so nutrient dense so one bag lasts us almost a month where a bag of purina would last us about weeks his skin allergies also cleared up in about month and his coat has never looked better and the dandruff is gone too the only down side is when you first switch over it can cause some loose stools but it gets better once their digestive system gets adjusted all in all if you can afford to feed them evo its well worth the

when i got my dog i did a lot of research regarding dog food and dog food ingredients there are high quality dog foods like this one out there but you probably will not find them in regular supermarkets while this food may be more expensive than other dog foods it is well worth it innova evo is one of the foods that were not affected by the recall also the ingredients are healthier and do not have high wheat grain content or nasty additives br br my used to have a lot of dandruff and had some skin problems also her poop was really mushy almost diarrhea when i finally switched her to innova evo red meat i would wished i would done it sooner she does not need to eat quite as much and her coat is beautiful no more dandruff problems and her skin is great

Review: we have two great and it is very hard for us to keep the weight on them br br evo is the first dog food that both of them enjoys i enjoy not having to chase them down and make sure that they eat br br i have also notice that our older dane is more active since he has been eating evo we feed them a mixture of the innova evo red meat and innova evo large bite dry dog food

a day with we use the large bites to help keep the and off of his teeth and to slow his eating due to the high quality of this food he can keep up his energy keep his weight up and recover more quickly from from running the field our vet exact words were your dog is an example of perfect health you may think the price on this food is high but it is worth it you get what you pay for also consider the canned version of this food it is a nice way to feed hydrate a dog after a long day hunting just give them an hour to settle down first on a side note we feed diamond naturals beef and rice in the off season we have no digestive issues transitioning from one to the other we switch over a period of a few weeks

complete protein based nutrition my dogs love this although i am not sure the actually tastes it she it so fast br br regarding the other users who have had diarrhea issues my picky gsd is that a word i think other gsd owners will understand has had this as well initially i this food thinking that he needed to be eating the same amount as he had been eating the other stuff br you feed much less of this product it is nutrient dense and not all filler like other foods if you over feed you increase the risk of unpleasant side effects br br it a bit pricey and i have not broken down the cost per day but since you feed less it might be competitive with other brands if someone was inclined to run the numbers

my wife switched our dogs to this food about months ago and she has virtually gone from daily to once a week the dogs hardly shed at all anymore no more brushing needed and their coats are very soft and shiny we have used other grain free foods previously and liked them but this one is definitely the best we have tried it is pricey but we are able to feed them of what we were using on the other foods and still maintain the same weight this food is well worth the price and the dogs love it

Review: has this texture and taste thing with gluten free products as well gritty or off tasting etc etc so i am happy he likes this one with gluten free products you really have to test them out one by one as some perform in the taste and texture area better than other blends my advice to anyone searching for gluten free products they want to try that it is best to buy them in the single packages if possible i know on amazon they sell them in bulk but if you find that you do not like it you are then stuck with alot of packages you no longer want just a tip for all of you out there it may cost more for one package but the waste will be much less unless you donate them to the local food bank good product and great results thank you bisquick

Review: gluten free recipes for this mix can be found on the betty crocker website they will not allow me to post the link here sorry br br update fun tip about this and other gluten free mixes my mom figured out that when you are mixing together your ingredients and you are using one that calls for milk that if you mix together only the base mix and the milk and let it set for about minutes before continuing with your recipe and adding other ingredients the end result is much fluffier and tastier this would be much like making tapioca pudding you have to let the milk and tapioca soak to the tapioca before moving on so i think that type of reaction is what is happening here with the bisquick mix yay for mom br br hope that helps you with your purchasing decision br thanks for reading

my wife and daughter are celiac but my son and i are not we have been using bob red mill gf pancake mix and it is pretty good but you can tell it is gluten free the pancakes we made today with this bisquick mix were amazing my mother my son and i could barely tell them from the normal wheat version on flavor the texture is a bit different but they are light and fluffy unlike a lot of overly dense gf versions we will definitely be stocking up on this and using it with some of the old stand by regular bisquick recipes to see how it works in them

so far i have only had time to make waffles with this new gf bisquick but they were delicious sometimes with gluten free products you have to use other weird ingredients or processes to make them these waffles were super fast easy and seriously delicious cannot wait to make other things

Review: get with some other decaf coffees it is a smooth mellow taste even a little sweet and with a hint of cocoa i really enjoyed this the grind is listed as extra fine but i did not find it particularly fine myself when i grind my own beans i have a finer grind than this but i still expected a stronger taste from the melitta than i would from other store brands however the melitta decaf was actually slightly weaker than other store brands we have tried we like our coffee strong about cup ground coffee for to cups water using measuring cups this ratio was not quite strong enough for me with the melitta but that is easily the nice thing about the coffee is that even when i made it very strong the smoothness remained i will definitely be trying other types of melitta coffee in the future

aroma throughout the house almost made it seem like i was in a coffee shop unfortunately it is just decaffeinated and did not give me the jolt i need in the morning br br the packaging caused some problems for me the seal is excessively tight i have never had this problem with starbucks dunkin donuts peet coffee or packs with the melitta it was so tight that when i did open it the bag tore apart and spilled a lot of the ground coffee onto my kitchen top and floor one could argue that this tight seal packs in all the flavor i could argue that if it were easier to open i would not have spilled maybe days worth of coffee grounds onto the floor br br pros light roast excellent aroma nutty and creamy taste br br cons decaf and hard to open pack br br overall
Original summary: packaging needs great taste is not my thing

Review: melitta rich product is a delicious treat comparable to coffees with a much higher price tag it is a plus that the decaffeinated version does not sacrifice flavour highly recommended

loaded two servings into a melitta filter i poured two cups of f water through the uniform grind is apparent in that the coffee did not clog as it does with blade ground coffee due to dust i drank the coffee black br br tasting br the smell is of decaf and or instant coffee pretty stale but the decaf process is partly to blame overall i enjoyed it as much as any drip decaf i have had recently there was no biting bitterness i drank two cups black without much of a ache br br pros br tight packaging with little air helps maintain freshness br excellent grind br low bitterness br br cons br not locally roasted br not fresh best by date is a year in advance br br verdict for mail order pre ground decaf this coffee lived up to expectations and was drinkable or stars
s: not as good as i like

Review: i love coffee i love coffee a lot and really do not enjoy decaf this decaf is not bitter though tastes smooth and brews up very nicely enjoyable to the last drop

this melitta cafe collection riviera sunset blend coffee is so full flavored it is much better than other decafs we have tried and really tastes like regular coffee which is great because enjoy aided coffee the summer so no worries about it keeping us awake all night recommended

teaspoons of coffee for six ounces of water that got my up so i measured out my coffee scoop and it is one tablespoon since i use two heaping scoops that is slightly more than three times as much as suggested on the package following the directions would probably make a watery undrinkable brew br br the coffee has a nice even espresso grind perhaps a bit lighter than a french roast i would have guessed that it was primarily arabica with some but melitta states that it is an all arabica blend from central and south america it is decaffeinated through the chemical free swiss water process which is the only acceptable way to decaffeinate as far as i am concerned br br also note the cute vintage travel poster style label and the clever name because it is decaffeinated it is perfect to drink while watching the sunset

the same way i normally make my coffee on the strong side the second time i followed the directions exactly both times using filtered water and a quality coffee maker that uses the melitta style cone filter to my taste it was stale and over ground like the flavor was watered out of it and then over roasted and ground extra fine to try and put some flavor back into it comparable in quality to low end bulk coffee the brands of decaf coffee i do like and brew at home dunkin and newman own to name only two are in the same price range and also purchased pre ground but to me taste much smoother and more full flavored this coffee is not one i would make a point to purchase when there are better coffee choices for the same money or cheaper coffee choices for the same quality

the price is great but i just did not like the taste of this coffee i am pretty picky about coffee and love to drink strong this one produce very acidic coffee when made strong but if you make it thin then it tastes okay with just slight acidic after taste how you would like this coffee is really depending on your personal taste of coffee but if you are like me drink coffee strong or dislike acidic after taste that lasts while then this is not for you
s: not as good as i like

Review: the main reason i drink decaf is to have the pleasure of coffee to go with dessert in the evening my caffeinated coffee is drunk in the morning only one cup so this coffee is pretty good with evening dessert since i will not get up flavor is good packaged well easy to brew
Original summary: pretty good to go with dessert

Review: an excellent bold medium blend of decaf coffee for a special evening dark enough without being bitter and a perfect compliment for a light desert

i had never heard of this coffee before but i got a bag and really liked it this melitta cafe riviera sunset decaf is a very good decaf with a good taste and body this stuff is perfect for a late night cup of coffee or for a cup with some dessert its decently priced and i will definitely buy this again

i thought this would be a great decaf option but the flavor is a lot milder than expected i use a bit more than the recommended amount to more intense flavor a bit better than instant for late night like me
s: not as good as it is

Review: melitta riviera sunset decaffeinated ground coffee turned out to be a good basic coffee not bitter not burned tasting a well rounded mellow brew that tastes like real coffee i had it this morning with almond milk stevia and a pinch of cinnamon and though i would had a bad night and did not even know if i could handle coffee it was delicious and easy on a morning tummy besides brewing it alone to get a nice decaffeinated coffee for night time drinking especially in the winter we have been mixing it with regular coffee in various blends depending on our caffeine related needs at the time br br the packaging is practical and easy to re close and the grind is good for my automatic coffeemaker i will buy this one again
s: not as good as i have

Review: i remembered that melitta was a very fine ground and thought it would likely go well in my coffee maker br br but after having a bag of whole beans and grinding it myself the melitta came up average at best better than maxwell house though
s: not as good as it is

Review: i like this coffee it smells good while brewing and tastes as good as it smells for a decaf coffee it is very good br will definitely buy this at my local store
this stuff tastes great i am not a decaf person but perhaps i am being won over by melitta coffee try it

i love coffee and admit that i am particular when it comes to good coffee i was not expecting much from this coffee and was pleasantly surprised to discover it was quite good it falls into the likes of starbucks and other shade grown coffee brands deep rich flavor br br though i enjoyed it i am not sure i would purchase this unless it was on sale i do find it a bit overpriced if you do not mind spending the money you will be happy with this coffee otherwise i would suggest purchasing this on sale for a special occasion
s: not as good as i have

Review: cone similar to this one a href http www amazon com gp product b q s ready set joe mug a and found that the extra fine grind of the riviera sunset blend an rich deliciously flavor much fresher than conventional by the pot coffee this method also allows me to brew strong coffee for me and a milder version for my hubby br br take time to bloom the grounds first add a little hot water to the fresh coffee grounds completely and then wait about seconds before brewing for best flavor this goes for any coffee br br melitta riviera sunset decaf blend is recommended by a coffee snob you will love it as is no sweeteners or creams needed to disguise this wonderful flavor i look forward to ordering more br br update just ordered my first pack through subscribe save great deal for some delicious decaf
Original summary: decaf never tasted so good stars

Review: strong not bitter good coffee flavor br br for the sake of comparison i most often drink the ground version of a href http www amazon com gp product b eq eight of the clock coffee decaf whole bean ounce bags pack of a right now on amazon melitta is slightly more expensive per ounce though subscribe and save would even it out and melitta brewing instructions call for using a smaller amount of grounds i would expect them to be about the same quality and in my opinion they were this is certainly a coffee i am happy to drink when i want decaf br br one downside is the bag my husband got to it before i did but he reported that it required scissors to get it open the feature on the bag then could not be used so we made the transfer to another sealed container

my wife and i both thought this is a nice cup of coffee the bag has a one way on it to keep the air out and arrived virtually flat when brewed in our cuisinart drip coffee maker it has a nice aroma i take mine with cream and sugar and mrs b drinks hers black we both thought it was smooth with no bitterness later it made a nice after dinner coffee when we added our favorite liquor tho i am no coffee snob i can tell a good cup of coffee from a bad one and this one makes the grade

this ground decaffeinated coffee makes a fine brew with a rich aroma and flavor it is smooth and satisfying with a full bodied taste my wife and i loved the taste and aroma of this ground coffee for an ideal cup measure one heaping teaspoon full of coffee per cup of hot water you could change the quantity depending on the strength of the coffee you desire i generally drink decaffeinated folgers brand and when i compared the two brands i did not find a great deal of difference in the richness of coffee you may want to consider the price between the two brands before you want to purchase this product
s: good coffee but not a great price

Review: i do not like coffee too much actually i am very particular about coffee and i can say that this is one of my favorites it is so smooth and flavorful the smell is really good and i cannot have enough of it i have gone as far as skipping going to starbucks or dunkin for coffee br the price is decent for this kind of product so i highly recommend it

de caf so i gave this a try br br while i agree with some other reviewers who have stated that there is a certain different taste about this blend for me it was not a bitter taste but instead a good strong flavor that the strong real coffee taste i enjoy i had a second cup and the flavor grew on me even more and i thought it really is delicious for a decaf br br the aroma is not truly satisfying why does this always happen with decaf but i think many decaf drinkers will be used to that lack br br the package had to be open with scissors this is tightly packed and then i just poured it into a zip for storage in the fridge br br i ll stick with regular coffee but i am sure my de caf loving friends will enjoy this

nice smell filled the air finally our coffee was ready and we both sat down to taste this product my husband he loves any coffee that has arabica beans he looked at me and said ummm this is really good my turn i sniffed some more i am a real before anything goes into my body it still smelled pretty good so now for the taste test br br okay it was definitely different than the dunkin donuts coffee that i am use to and love however it had a smooth flavor but a little richer than i like and i did not seem to notice that it was decaf that was a good thing it was flavorful and made a pretty good cup of coffee hubby liked it a lot so i would have to say it was a winner a good rich coffee flavor and a good price

the pleasant aroma i put in a little cream and as i usually do and found the taste a little on the light side yet quite bitter maybe it is because this is decaf but what i did like was its something cent coffees usually lack i have made two cups a day since my first taste and over the last couple of days i have grown to like this coffee granted to me coffee is pretty much like wine in that all the different varieties taste more or less the same except for the level of bitterness but even i can tell this is gourmet coffee much better than the ones i get at my local coffee stands or even at when they give out free cups br br for a pack of the price seems decent if you drink decaf i think this is quite worth a try
Original summary: good quality coffee at a decent price

Review: not much of a decaf drinker unless i am craving a cup late night for some reason i have to say this coffee tasted average at best i am a coffee fan and coming from them to this well it missed the mark i gave some to my mother in law and she seemed happy with it so stars in that respect i might try mixing it with my non decaf coffee to see how it tastes but i am not holding my breath if the price was a few cheaper definitely would bump it up a star
s: not as good as i be

Review: if you are truly looking for a decaf that will no longer make your heart race this is not the coffee for you it is quite flavorful so i do recommend it to those who can still tolerate a bit of kick in their coffee

Review: i would recommend this as a good basic coffee it has a satisfying flavor and will make many a good cup of coffee i prefer drinking my coffee black and i found this to be produce a good cup it is not bitter and even though i had the decaffeinated coffee it did not taste flat like so many decafs do

of joe just before i call it a night yeah sometimes i get a little due to too much caffeine intake and so i thought i would give this decaff a go what you get is a good cup without any bitterness but it is a little weak and i recommend dropping about more into your brewer to get a fuller flavor also as it is vacuum packed into a slim cardboard box it arrived completely squished flat nothing like the fat photo in the amazon product shot i know it is a minor thing to complain about but i like leaving my coffee out next to the coffee maker and this item would not even stand up it was about thick br br so you are not going to have mr wolf you for your great coffee with this one but for a decaff it is not half bad
s: not as good as i be

Review: br br i m a little sensitive to caffeine and like to have a decaf on hand for drinking later in the day and i bought this primarily to use with my mr coffee frappe maker a href http www amazon com gp product b g mr coffee ounce frappe maker a let me just put in a quick for that i love it i found the riviera sunset stood up well to all the milk flavoring and ice in making a frappe again with a significant increase in the amount used br br i would probably not purchase this coffee just because of my own on coffee i look for bird friendly fair trade brands and i find nothing to indicate that melitta makes any effort to meet these expectations leaving aside these though i think those who enjoy a somewhat light easy drinking brew would like this coffee

without all the fuss and this is what i was hoping for in the melitta riviera decaf to a good degree i was happy with it but it is certainly not something i would curl up with when in the mood for a really outstanding cup of coffee br br the are the aroma the of the grind and the overall taste which i would rate as fairly mild and maybe a slight bit on the acid side i found i liked it best either in a french press or in my espresso maker two that make the most out of somewhat weak coffee brewed i found i could compensate by using somewhat more coffee than usual br br still although not a serious to the world best coffees it does not cost a pound either i would have to say that for the price it is definitely worth trying
s: not as good as i have

Review: great not like other decaf which seems to a weird taste to me if you keep different decafs to find one you like definitely give this a try
i like the smooth taste of this coffee it is decaf so not too strong but really not very light either it is just the light coffee that sometimes needed at mid day recommended

this is good for packaged ground coffee and for decaf it definitely has a strong coffee flavor this is great for that down cup of coffee late night that will not keep you up because of the caffeine br br each sealed package holds ten ounces of extra fine ground coffee the bag feels sturdy if you prefer to keep your ground coffee in its original packaging br br with coffee prices going up it may be a good idea to compare the prices of this if you try this and like it you get a better price with the amazon subscribe save option versus getting coffee beans from your local coffee shop and grinding them at home or having the coffee shop grind them for you

disclaimer i am a coffee addict i am also a starbucks addict so i have become a bit about my coffee preferences and cannot stand the economy stuff i have had regular melitta coffee before and was impressed by it so i decided to give the decaf version a try especially when the weather gets cold i like a nice hot cup of coffee in the evenings and do not particular want to be tossing and turning hours later br br the riviera sunset decaf coffee is an excellent decaf for those times you do not want the real thing it had a nice rich flavor with no bitter aftertaste while i continue to prefer the real thing on most occasions i am glad to know there is a good flavorful substitute for when i do not want caffeine

Review: smooth with no sacrifice in taste and does taste as good as regular coffee i usually do not have any coffee after dinner and never really cared for decaf but i now have an after dinner alternative and no sacrifice in flavor

boy this was good the aroma when you first open the package leaves one with great anticipation that you will soon be enjoying a great cup of java too often times the result does not meet the expectations not so with the melitta cafe collection the coffee was amongst the best i have ever tasted treat yourself to a fantastic splurge

Review: i am not a big fan of decaffeinated coffee i figure what is the point taste is so often compromised i have recently found that caffeine me if i drink it after pm so it is decaff or nothing at that point riviera tastes like regular coffee i was so impressed i decided to try it as my morning coffee i expected to have a very negative response to not getting the morning caffeine of my usual coffee but that did not happen if you must give up caffeine this is a great solution

Review: i have decaffinated a few times and always find myself returning to coffee for the flavor with this product i will not have to do that anymore the flavor of this coffee is exceptional it is as full and rich as any off the shelf coffee i have ever tasted highly recommended

this melitta riviera sunset blend is a nice and light coffee that is suitable for anytime of day it is particularly great for drinking at night because it is decaffeinated the texture is nice and does not have an acidic taste or anything it is meant for casual drinkers i do prefer my coffee darker with caffine but i did enjoy this blend i would recommend giving this a try and judge for yourself

Review: melitta cafe is a smooth flavorful coffee that compares well with regular coffee this is not the typical weak decaf blend that is true of many american brands melitta has a rich deep taste and a nice dark color tastes great black or with cream as a stand alone coffee no cream sugar it has a smooth though strong flavor just like regular coffee this coffee is especially great as an after dinner drink strong enough to taste like regular coffee but decaffeinated so it will not prevent sleep later great coffee

Review: i have a keurig coffee maker you know the one with the k cups to have a coffee like this you have to have a special filter which i do have honestly you will spend a of money on k cups if you do not get the filter for regular ground coffee anyway i do not know if it was because the coffee was ground or filtered a special way but the water in my keurig had a hard time seeping through causing a bit of an overflow aside from that the taste was smooth and flavorful it has a coffee taste plain and simple is it anything special not really it just tastes good and is reasonably priced

Review: very smooth and i used my own filters the smell is so i used my own measurements because it was not on the package i used l per cup and i worked out fine for me i like my coffee tasteful

melitta filters and still individually make each cup of coffee in a single cup filter generally i use pre ground coffee so i am not a purist although i occasionally grind my own i usually drink two cups of coffee a day enough about my coffee habits br br melitta is a pretty trusted name in the coffee industry and i expected this coffee to be be a quality product i was not disappointed with the coffee although it was not quite as exciting as the regular vanilla flavored coffee i recently tried from melitta the flavor was pretty strong and rich although decaf always has a slight aftertaste even with the swiss water process used for generally i drink regular coffee as my first choice but i admit that i switch to decaf in the evening br br i have no problem recommending this coffee as a second choice

Review: which i found pleasing br br i did face one challenge with this coffee the bag was very difficult to open without it after working on it for several minutes i had decided i was not going to let a bag beat me i discovered that i was able to open it be starting at the end where the bag was folded back once i got my finger inside the bag the rest came easy fortunately the two small tears i made in the bag were high enough to fold under when the bag was closed the bag recommends storage in a refrigerator br br this coffee is pleasant and refreshing and i have enjoyed drinking it if you are a coffee lover you owe it to yourself to give this coffee a try and see what you think i hope you are as pleased with it as i am

Review: ok i have to admit i was a huge fan you know that big coffee chain on every corner i did not expect much from a coffee ordered online but i take any thoughts back after the first sip of this smooth rich coffee there is none of the gritty acidic after taste of other coffees but instead a blooming silky flavor of nuts mocha and pure coffee mind you this is not a flavored coffee it has all of these built into the riviera sunset decaf blend oh did i forget to mention it is decaf i could not believe it myself when i looked at the bag the second day i thought it was true coffee by the flavor alone though i did notice the lack of as would any decaf highly recommended and i am switching

this coffee has a more present flavor than the stuff they brew for us at work yet it goes down smoothly to my wife and i that is a good combination the fact that it comes already ground does not do anything to the flavor either

Review: not morning without it br br i tend to buy more affordable e g supermarket type brands of coffee so i can splurge on tea so this was a real treat outstanding aroma just opening the bag and even better when brewing smooth taste and highly drinkable black the only way i drink coffee or tea br br my only complaint is opening the bag based on what other reviewers stated i opened it over a plastic so it would catch any very glad i did an amount was spilled when i cut into the bag i it into an air tight container i have had this problem with other vacuum packed coffee but the very fine grind of the melitta made it even more of a problem br br still not enough of a problem to warrant taking away a rating star this makes a wonderful cup of coffee

Review: i have tried to give up my coffee habit but it just has not been easy and i did manage to switch to decaf a couple years ago so i suppose that is something i am a moderate coffee drinker i like cups of hot joe to get me started in the morning and love a nice iced coffee on a hot afternoon this melitta riviera sunset decaf is smooth and does not have the bitter aftertaste that i dislike in one of the leading brands the flavor is great and i have enjoyed it both hot and iced

Review: what can you say about coffee either you like it or you don t i liked this coffee although when i choose to review it i did not notice it was decaf that aside it tastes fine made in my keurig but if you want the kick get the caffeinated one

Review: taste and pleasant aroma it did not have that bitter plastic aftertaste you find in a lot of decaf coffees br br the grind is very fine my coffee filters let a little bit of the coffee through use good quality filters with this coffee br br it was difficult to open the package and the little wire closer fell off after the second time however i understand why coffee is packages this way to the exposure of the oils in the coffee to air and of course a fine grind has a larger surface to mass ratio making it age even faster so i forgive them for the packaging you really need an airtight container to store this kind of coffee br br personally i like to grind my coffee right before using but the convenience and taste of this melitta has convinced me that there are other options

Review: first let us talk about the packaging i hate when coffee come packaged in bags like this they are quite and in my opinion do not keep the coffee fresh enough br br as for the coffee itself this was one of the better tasting decaf i have had it has a very rich flavor that you do not normally find with decaffeinated coffee it has a wonderful aroma as well very pleased with this product

Review: when it comes down to melitta they definitely have known for all this time what it takes to really made a great cup of coffee with their cafe collection they bring out the best in flavors for all kinds of coffee lovers and that is really a strong aroma with their sunset they definitely bring out a decaffinated taste that feels like it is full of at the beginning of the morning i really love it the taste is strong and the aroma is just delightful all in all i absolutely recommend this as a great treat in the morning to wake up and enjoy br br price b br br taste b br br overall b

this coffee smelled wonderful while it was brewing my husband drinks a lot more coffee than i do and he agreed that this is a great tasting coffee we are looking forward to trying melitta other varieties

tell that it was decaffeinated this is important because most decaf coffees have an odd taste to me but that was missing from this product br br furthermore i had to ask a coffee lover for an opinion so i asked my mother in law who drinks all kinds of coffees from all over the world almost times a day she was skeptical at first because she refuses to drink decaf however after a few sips of this coffee she said that although it is a mild coffee it was in fact very tasty and nothing at its decaf origins she liked it so much she poured another cup br br between the two of us we have almost finished the bag it should pass the test from even the coffee drinkers i positively recommend this product and i hope you enjoy your next cup of coffee from this company

Review: this is the best decaf my family and i have tried in a long time it is smooth not bitter and has enough flavor without being too strong like some other brands i have tried i like that it is decaffeinated using the natural swiss water process instead of chemicals that is a big plus for me because many brands do not tell you how they decaffeinate their coffee i usually buy whole bean but this ground is so nice and fine and it saves me time having to grind it and get it just right i would suggest following the instructions given on the bag for the best taste seal tightly and store in the refrigerator to keep the flavor this is one i will be buying again

Review: melitta cafe collection gourmet coffee is wonderful it tastes rich and just like a gourmet coffee should this coffee tasted like something i could have gotten in europe at a cafe br br it brewed very quickly and with no coffee grain residue this is probably due to the coffee being an extra fine grind the decaffinated version tasted great on its own without milk or sugar to season br br i m a coffee lover and i enjoy gevalia and godiva coffee two other excellent brands the melitta stands on its own and are their in taste and price enjoy a cup today

your child regularly they will develop a sweet tooth quickly and will start pure vegetables other good things because of this there is no need to applesauce or other sweeteners into other foods that is just and there is only one reason for it so the child will eat it and only want this brand br br best advice if you must buy pre made food be sure the ingredients are just the main ingredient s and if needed water that is it do not buy a vegetable that has applesauce or another silly ingredient added just to make the child love it and want that brand because it is sweetened br br shame on earth best as a company kudos to their marketing department for creating a name whereas consumers will automatically be drawn to them because they think it is a great product based solely on the name

along with several others without running the ingredients by my wife first a nurse of years she br was surprised when she noticed it we went a and poured my order down the drain afterwards there is pure and then there is not so much br br from the website br br propylene glycol br br a cosmetic form of mineral oil found in automatic and fluid and in the skin and hair propylene glycol works as a which causes of moisture content of skin or cosmetic products by preventing the escape of moisture or water the material safety sheet users to avoid skin contact with propylene glycol as this strong skin can cause liver and kidney damage br also used in br br br rubber cleaner br de br stain br br br paint br br br br i wrote the company about this concern and they never responded

i purchased some of this special habanero sauce this past year for my super bowl party it was a hit i thought i would try the mild since i like some zing but did not want to burn my mouth off it was a great mix of some spicy zing with a sweet overtone went great with chips as a dip as well as really good with as a dipping sauce with chicken wings br br i am thinking about using this as a glaze as well for an upcoming pork i think this sauce is a great change of pace from the person who is sick of the same tastes that you get from the same stuff in the local grocery stores plus it is from a small business win win win br br thanks again sauce for a great change of pace

mild sauce is like a condiment it goes on everything and does not take over the flavor of the food but enhances it i use this sauce on burgers shredded pork grilled chicken baked chicken eggs as a pizza sauce substitute and basically anything my kids love the mild kick and flavorful of the mild sauce my and year old put it on everything and rave it will change your cooking and challenge you to try it on everything

i have to say without a doubt it is the next best thing to put on food i will start off by saying i do know the maker of this sauce and although that may seem like this review is a bit biased i wanted to be the first to state the flavorful blend of this sauce can literally go on everything br br i like spicy and unlike other like red hot this does not mask the flavor of the food but adds to it br i have used this sauce on hotdogs hamburgers chicken tacos and eggs br br the mild is a little bit sweeter than the medium and hot the hot being the heat that i particularly enjoy but this stuff can be added to almost any sauce or family recipe to give it that extra kick of spicy sweetness that will make your mouth water
Original summary: this stuff is the on everything sauce

Review: i have been a huge fan of jelly since i was a kid which was about years ago i have always had a favorite at first it was peach then banana juicy pear came along and that was my favorite for about ten years i thought nothing would top it ever then i tried red apple it is sweet and tart and really delicious my new favorite flavor a ten pound box is surprisingly tempting and i am sorry they are currently all sold out

i was not sure what to expect from this jelly belly flavor i have eaten red apples before but they were usually in a fruit this was a bean with red apple flavors put inside despite the obvious i tried this confection because i am not afraid of the unknown like so many people in the right wrong i was surprised to find that this red apple had a delicious apple like flavor and a chew not unlike a finely prepared would i eat more of these yes i would i would also recommend this red apple to anybody who is and wants to experience a new and exciting way to feel the best parts of the fruit eating process red apple jelly beans they do taste like apples kind of but not completely still pretty good
s: not as good as i be

this is the only oatmeal that my family will even consider eating i make it in the crock pot overnight and it is always ready when we are i use my small crock pot for the two of us i start with a cup of oatmeal add a dash of cinnamon and a splash of vanilla add a cup of milk and cups cold water place the lid on the crock pot and plug it in it will be ready in the morning when you are i let mine cook approx hours my small crock pot has no settings just off or on we love to add some brown sugar and dried blueberries or at the table

Review: switch orange tangerine is ok but not what one might expect first of all there is more apple and grape juice in here than orange or tangerine this will not be a surprise if you are familiar with the other flavors as that is also true with them br br switch basically is carbonated juice the taste is not a bad and it is supposed to be healthier than soda which can be it is a reasonable drink for snacks but if you are going to need several if you are actually thirsty

it is sweeter than regular cane sugar and thus it is cheaper to use but it is also known to cause diarrhea particularly in children br br so another drink on the hit of healthy drinks appealing to the concern for their ever growing and them that this will help continued growth br br you are better off drinking diet coke you would be even more better off buying the sparkling flavored waters with no calories my favorite is in pomegranate lime lemon and orange flavors and is sold from time to time on amazon as well as your local supermarket br br better yet buy some organic pure fruit juice such as pomegranate and pour cup in a glass of your favorite sparking water or a quarter cup in a oz bottle of your favorite sparkling water at least it is the actual juice and not some fructose extract

compared to your average oz bottle and roughly times the cost of cans when comparing equal amount by the ounce also read the ingredients it contains more apple and grape juice than orange or tangerine which means that the taste is probably aided by the natural flavors which does not mean oranges just that it was derived from natural not chemically made br br the the switch seems straight forward but it is also a little which leads me to my biggest complaint granted it is all natural but each oz can contains g of carbs of sugar alone that is more sugar than soda in some cases by almost grams a serving more sugar even if it is not corn syrup is more calories per can so even at it is single serving size you would almost be better off drinking a coke and taking a vitamin c pill

Review: the switch in orange tangerine has perfect serving size to keep the sugar in take at its minimum and naturally the carbonated sensation adding extra to the taste buds br br that was my wife first impression br br i like the fruit soda idea it maybe a better alternative soda if it is indeed made of natural orange but it taste likes other carbonated orange flavored soda on the market the only benefit you are getting and not from the regular soda is it contains daily recommended vitamin c if the price is right does not hurt to try
Original summary: great taste but not new taste

Review: i have now tried several of the switch drinks they are not bad for a carbonated juice drink especially this actually was one of the better flavors i have tried it is got a nice orange juice type flavor that i enjoyed ultimately these drinks remind me of apple beer which is essentially carbonated apple juice i love that drink and think switch could try an apple version of their product i am sure i would love it as well br br that being said give it a try it will quench your thirst and i am sure it will do well in the it fills a void where very few drink manufacturers have entered
s: not as good as it is

Review: i do not know if it has changed since then but when i lived in years ago one thing that stood out to me was how real drinks tasted compared to the artificial flavors typical of america switch brought me back to those days it starts out tangy and the taste turns sweeter in my mouth if they knocked calories off i would definitely purchase this regularly
s: not as good as it is

Review: to have a and are about cents and it would take to do the entire half gallon so all said and done it would cost me about per ounce to make my own carbonated orange tangerine drink so it is about the cost to make it myself no i did not factor in the cost of the itself so that could be considered loading the dice br br so i guess the bottom line here is if you are really big on the whole carbonated orange tangerine thing then you can either buy this product and not be disappointed or you can make a very close of it yourself for about of the cost assuming you have a or you can buy a two liter bottle of house brand orange soda for a buck at your local supermarket and get much the same experience while saving about in the process

i always liked orange crush when i was a kid sure it was just sugar water with some flavoring but it was really good flavoring except it had a chemical and an aftertaste that you just had to accept br br well no more switch orange tangerine drink is not sugar water it is juice the good stuff and it is lightly carbonated not like those sugary soft drinks either and no chemical and no aftertaste br br vitamin c and no added sugar i will take that of course there is sugar content but it is just the natural sugar that comes in the juice why did not people think of this stuff when i was a kid

saw the switch orange tangerine was available i knew i had to try it i liked the kiwi strawberry quite well better than some other reviewers did it seems so i was sure i would enjoy this one just as much br br the initial taste of this orange tangerine carbonated juice is rather tart and the carbonation just seems to make it more tart the aftertaste is rather pleasant so if the aftertaste is what you are looking for in a drink this is the drink for you my wife thought it tasted a bit like champagne if that is any indication of what to expect from this drink br br the flavor is different and not at all what i expected not very refreshing at all i would buy the kiwi berry drink but i think i will take a pass on the orange tangerine in the future

switch is a natural carbonated fruit juice beverage i like the way it tastes it is very sweet and a little tangy the ingredients are as follows juice from apple grape tangerine orange and acerola gum acacia natural flavors and colors ascorbic acid vitamin c soy br br an oz can has calories grams of carbs daily requirement of vitamin c and not much else

the mixture of juices they use to sweeten this give it a little bit of an odd taste and makes it too sweet it is not a straight orange citrus flavor not being an apple juice fan i was not fond of it br br i gave it four stars b c it is what it advertises it is juice with sparkling water unlike some other healthy sparkling beverages that are basically soda br br for sparkling juice i prefer izze it is a little less sweet

Review: this is a nice refreshing carbonated drink it has no added sugar as advertised but its name is a bit misleading the orange tangerine also has some apple and grape juice added the grape is not a great addition to the blend so i was not thrilled with the flavor

this was the most potent orange drink i have ever had it might be juice but this drink has some kick br br there are no artificial sweeteners in this drink but it is so highly concentrated that it was sweet and even the tang of the carbonation could not cute into the sugary flavor br br it was way too strong for me and i thought it had kind of an odd aftertaste but if you like carbonation and have a powerful craving for orange tangerine this is the drink for you

Review: energy drinks are very popular these days most if not all are loaded with sugar various of vitamins and varying energy blends a few energy drinks have tried adding pure juice but have only come up with at most br br if your not a young un and cannot handle that blast of sugar and crash that follows then switch is a better alternative switch is juice zero sugar and lots of vitamin c br br switch is carbonated so with the orange tangerine flavor picture your morning juice with a little soda the taste is sweet but not sugary although the size of the can probably to the recommended serving most people probably do not have this little juice in one sitting br br soda meets juice benefits it is a no brainer how about some more flavors
Original summary: sweet and carbonated like energy but without the sugar

Review: the switch tries to the line between soda and juice and i would say that the experiment is successful it is sweet and rich like soda but it is as the label says juice and therefore of more nutritional value i guess it all comes down to taste and it is more similar to soda than juice here maybe like a more down sunkist soda as i said i liked it and i would probably pick it up again though it has not squirt as my favorite

i have tasted several of the other flavors of this drink switch but i have to say that this one tops them all perhaps it is because i like orange soda and this drink seems to have all the elements of what i like in the soda without all the harmful ones there is no sugar added no preservatives no artificial colors and it is gluten free this is especially great for someone with allergies or those who are on restricted diets add to that that it is juice and tastes great and you have a winner i liked this product and plan to seek it out at my local store
s: not as good as it is

Review: is what these machines are designed to do br br no matter what method i use i have learned to carefully reach in and pull the little gasket down as far as i can on the upper needle this will ensure a better seal and avoid overflow br br just as importantly when i put the disposakup in i press it down to make sure the lower needle has the cup completely this will make sure you have a flow of water that through the cup br br fill it up and then tap the cup on the counter to settle the coffee grinds into the cup do not press the coffee down or pack it in br br the key is take a couple extra seconds and these will work perfectly and you will save money i love mine and will be ordering more once they are available again

Review: as a long time yerba mate and coffee drinker runa traditional guayusa has switched me over the super smooth and sweet flavor to this tea gives it the same of any other based drink but with the lasting power and complexity as any high end tea br br drink up

i was introduced to runa guayusa about months ago and i have been drinking it pretty consistently since then it is a great alternative to coffee which tends to make me nervous the taste is mild and almost a little sweet also it does not get bitter like green tea or yerba mate when steeped for too long br br also runa business model makes me feel good about drinking this tea they are a certified b and they do great work with the farmers in the amazon br br i highly recommend you try it

i usually do not drink tea because it does not have the caffeine kick i am looking for but guayusa tea has almost as much caffeine as a cup of coffee and unlike coffee it does not need to be in cream and sugar to taste good and does not have any of the other unpleasant side effects i usually add about half a spoonful of sugar per cup which is enough to pleasantly complement the natural flavor now if only starbucks would start carrying guayusa

Review: as a tea runa traditional guayusa offers a simple taste that is not like any other tea i have had i used to swear by matcha green tea but runa is a superior alternative in that it is super cheap more much easier to swallow and offers just as many health benefits br br also if you look into it runa doing some great things on the side of social and rainforest i highly suggest reading into it it will make you love the product even more

life thirsty or not hot or cold this tea can help you in many ways as a college student to be an i cannot just take prescribed drugs all the time to keep my attention span up instead i turn to caffeine all day every day runa tea has been one of the few products that have really caused me to feel refreshed as if i was just hydrated after a run as well as feeling as if i were ready to write a page paper from scratch i do not know what it is but it just makes you feel good in every way personally i love the cold tea but as a consumer everyone needs to find their niche as i am a huge hot tea drinker and chose the cold version either way same thing you need to try it and then try and our star opinions
clean taste and clean energy br br packaging is attractive simple and elegant as well br br sourcing and organic round out the whole package br br overall nice product

as much of a tea fanatic as i consider myself i would never heard of before running into the runa brand now that i have i could see myself buying it over and over again it has a full bodied flavor without the bitter aftertaste of some black teas it is earthy without being heavy handed or overpowering completely unique from any other tea i have tasted you will not find tea like this anywhere else and though the product for itself the business model of this brand does not hurt runa buys guayusa directly from local farmers in ecuador at fair trade prices try it it is worth every cent

Review: i have tried pills and special milk with no results br br i use this instead and have none of those symptoms measure into your mixing bowl cup pitcher etc and slowly mix in hot water as soon as it is paste you can add cold water doing it this way prevents clumping br br i like it and add just a touch of sugar or other sweetner kids cannot tell the difference between this and cow milk i use tbs of blackstrap molasses per oz milk it turns the milk light brown think iced coffee but my family does not mind we like the way it tastes and appreciate the extra iron calcium and potassium from the molasses has to be blackstrap this type has only g carbs per tbsp i use less powder than recommended scoops for oz instead of the recommended this helps to the goat flavor

not only kept her clear she put much needed weight on after diagnosed with a chronic illness she has beaten i have read some of the other reviews as a former vet i do ask if your cat is vomiting please see your vet asap hairballs that are very bad can kill a cat

and they never vomit they wolf them down thought i think they are crunching they have not totally stopped their occasional hairball but it is rare perhaps they would completely solve it if i could afford to give them to them all the time only problem with this product is i would love to buy it in a larger bag if they just made one if your cat do not like em move on but definately worth a try if you want a treat that also helps with hairballs

loves these treat so much and they work very well for hairballs he has long hair and if he goes without these treats for a few days he is throwing up hairballs and driving me crazy begging for his treats i have been able to teach him to stay off of things by not giving him treats too i noticed that always chews them well so that may be the reason that some cats vomit

my cat is very picky and this is the only hairball remedy that i can give him that he eats and it works i do not have a problem with him vomiting at all i give him about treats per day and you have to make sure that you are giving them on an empty stomach and the hairballs pass through his system he never spits them up i used to purchase them at the store but they stopped carrying this specific type and only sell the hairball tartar control combo ones now my cat hates them so happy to find these online
Original summary: the only product that helps my cat with

Review: as with most cats i have read about here both of mine these down without even the slightest tooth mark in them this can make them vomit so my trick is to snap them in two so then they have to chew them because of the edges im used to the since i have they have smaller than a regular tom does and these are not hard to snap at all they love the taste of these although i am not all that sure they really help with the does anything really help though i do recommend these because of the great taste but try them in two if your cat has trouble vomiting after gulping his her food

Review: my cats love the food and it is on the happy list of companies that do not test on animals through the peta site peta org that is very

it i have fed them the chicken and liver flavor and the seafood flavor so far and they seem to like both equally i find it a bit more expensive than i had hoped it would be but then again there is no waste and i consider that in itself a savings alone i am a firm believer in better ingredients and less fillers and allergens make for less poop less litter use fewer trips to the vet and an overall healthier cat br br update i have tried all the flavors on my cats and the chicken and liver seems to be the one they like the most they have now all the other flavors including the seafood flavor that they originally liked i also wanted to add that this is a very strong smelling brand of cat food almost overpowering when i open the cans at feeding time

i am amazed how many are being so easily fooled what you are seeing is a generic ingredient list that covers multiple coffees what it is saying based on the photo i see above is that if the coffee type you have is straight coffee then all it contains is arabica coffee but if what you are drinking is a flavored coffee then the ingredients in it are arabica coffee and flavorings but if what you are drinking is a decaf variety then it contains arabica coffee that has been decaffeinated with acetate as is standard br br so if you are not holding a decaf variety then there is no decaffeinated beans it is nothing more than generic catch all ingredients that apply to variety you happen to be looking at br br think people lol

for the best br br thankfully hawaiian hazelnut blows all of the other hazelnut k cups out of the water it is smokey and delicious without being dark and overwhelming the hazelnut really does taste like actual hazelnut which you would think would be something a coffee drinker could take for granted but we have been disappointed in the past i would never tried coffee from the wolfgang puck brand before but our positive experience with hawaiian hazelnut has definitely gotten me interested in trying other varieties br br the hazelnut flavor is pretty bold and full bodied which is nice but there is no bitterness or acidity to be found this suits me just fine since i enjoy a milder roast but people who enjoy their coffee strong and dark might not enjoy this blend as much br br we ll definitely be this coffee when we run out
Original summary: an excellent hazelnut choice for your keurig

Review: if you like to taste the flavor in your flavored coffee skip this one i have struggled to taste the creme caramel flavoring that is supposed to be in here the coffee flavor is also slightly bitter but that could just be my taste buds longing for some flavoring i would recommend green mountain gloria jeans or van houtte brands before this one

Review: so here is another example of a pack of k cups i bought i figured well i really enjoy sumatra bold smooth and rich with a bit of bitterness flaver so why not wolfgang puck has a few restaurants so maybe he knows coffee br br so this is utterly average in all it is not very bold or rich although i can say it does have the bitterness which is a bit as it lacks the richness purchased only because it appeared on the subscribe save at a great price per k cup that makes two wp that have been run of the mill at best sumatra french roast next time i will be more discerning

i really like to mix things up with k cups and rarely buy ct boxes of a single flavor exception to the rule would be for dark bold coffees such as french roasts which i really enjoy so when wolfgang puck french roast turned up on amazon deal of the week even though i have never tried before now i have units br br it fairly non for a french roast decent aroma but taste is compared to for example a diedrich french roast i do not hate or even dislike it it is okay and for the price i paid is acceptable without complaint it may make an acceptable guest coffee for those wanting something a little bolder without being over the top rich br br i d call it mildly bold average and i will not be going out of my way to keep it on hand

my favorite k cup so far absolutely no aftertaste which in my book is a huge plus it is not acidic not bitter just a great mild cup of coffee which is exactly what it to be i wish other people would read the description before they give a bad review based on their own do not buy a medium roast coffee and complain because it is not bold also as a general rule the ones with breakfast in the name are milder i do not care for bold dark roast slap you awake coffee so i would not buy a bold coffee and then complain that it was bold
s: good coffee but not a great price

Review: just like you would the chicken in a general recipe general tofu is awesome the flavor comes from the sauce so you do not need to marinate first br br some people also freeze tofu generally remove from packaging and press first to give it a firmer consistency br br tofu is all about how you prepare it most people will not like it plain so do not expect to just dig a fork into it br br this product is great because of its all purpose nature firm is definitely better than soft for saute etc and its shelf life i would have given it five stars but the must be refrigerated versions packaged in fluid do seem to be firmer they do not last as long in the house though so this is a perfect choice to keep in the pantry usually a few to several months out
Original summary: great life very good for use

Review: graham cracker crust you have got a pie or i will add some peanut butter cocoa powder and maple syrup to make a mousse i also like to just add strawberries and bananas and maple syrup for a yogurt i use it to make sour cream and onion dips for vegetables i also like it to make sour cream for mexican food and potatoes my boyfriend cannot even tell the difference also good to make mayonnaise for potato salad i recommend a food processor or blender to really get the smooth creamy texture this tofu is the best stuff on the planet i order the pack of it because i got through or more a week also i like to get the organic because soybeans are typically highly sprayed it is worth the few extra bucks i love this stuff behind my almond milk this is my most vital ingredient

Review: having recently turned vegan i had to buy my supply of tofu this stuff is the bomb i have not done a lot of exotic things with it thus far but i love to use it as a salad dressing potato topper i crack open a brick dump it into the blender add a little vinegar a little soy milk onion power dill tiny bit of celery seed a generous dose of nutritional yeast i blend all that up till it is smooth and then store it in a glad container in the stays fresh for about days i like to just dump this stuff all over my meal of baked potatoes lettuce br br i cannot wait to all the options with this stuff banana pudding may be next

chocolate pudding with this stuff a box of silken tofu some dark cocoa powder stevia and then a bit of milk to it up in a blender or food processor and it makes a super creamy delight that i do not feel guilty about eating and leaves me more satisfied than your standard pudding chill it and it becomes a thick luscious mousse making myself hungry br br i love that it is a shelf stable product that i can have on hand for meals br br sometimes i make burgers by mixing it with smoked paprika garlic onion nutritional yeast oatmeal masa flour bit of nice oil until a thick consistency and fry up and they are just fantastic br br i think this is one of those foods that is so versatile and easy to play with and gives you a nice bit of protein to your diet

that sells gluten free stuff and this is no exception if you have celiac this will not make you sick br br even better this is powdered agar agar not flaked agar agar that means this will last for months if not years although it is also easy to use too much tablespoon of the flakes tsp of the powder the ratio most cooks call for is cup liquid to teaspoon flaked agar agar which means tsp of this powder to cup liquid with more added for more acidic things like orange juice br br however agar agar does not gel as well as jell o so do not expect to get the same results that you would for jell o for that you need jell o or kosher gelatin you can add more agar agar to add firmness but then it starts to taste like what it is seaweed

i received the agar about days after ordering it comes in a slightly different bottle now but i assume its the same agar agar as before the bottle has a snap lid i m not so sure about the quality of the seal so i keep the agar agar in an airtight container just as a i dont plan on eating any of this but i have used this successfully with experiments in dishes the agar is light enough to see everything well in the dish so it works great for that

agar is basically gelatin for or vegetarians regular gelatin is usually animal based and is made from leftover body parts of animals that would otherwise be thrown away sound appetizing agar is a free alternative and is a great aid anytime a thickened creamy base is required usually in baking i use this for many cream pies as well as other desserts

i bought the lb bottle for use in experiments i have not really eaten any of it yet so i cannot comment on the taste or anything like that br but for growing things it is great br since it is a powder it is easy to measure out use unlike those annoying flaky bars br after the agar sets it is quite clear which is nice

Review: also the cheapest i use it to make an awesome vanilla latte just put two spoonfuls of the medaglia d oro espresso in a coffee cup and add about shots of hot water and mix place a shot of vanilla syrup in a tall glass more or less according to individual taste next add enough not crushed ice to fill the glass of the way up then fill the glass with enough cold milk to cover the ice the hot coffee mix over the milk and ice and stir until mixed add more ice as needed and then pour enough half and half to color the coffee mix to a yummy caramel color delicious and cheaper than the espresso stands once you have the ingredients on hand is also great in recipes that call for instant espresso not all stores carry this product so i order from through amazon com

cats are finicky animals and what one loves another will not touch that is not a on the food itself i have two and their eating habits are very different my local pet nutrition center gave me a sample of prowl the other day and while my one cat absolutely loves it the other will not touch it that is why samples are nice both of my cats have been on evo kibble but this one cat who now loves the prowl has a habit of throwing up and i am on the prowl myself for an alternative food that will help her keep food down so far no she also it up as soon as i have added warm water no waiting i highly recommend you obtain a sample and let the cat decide as the food is economical as well as healthy

i feed prowl because it is a high quality healthy food that does not break my budget it is much cheaper than other premium wet foods wellness etc and my cat seems to like it the only downside to prowl is that since it is dehydrated you must mix it with water and wait minutes before serving my kitten at me the entire time br i started my cat on prowl because my vet offered a free sample she ate it right away with no problems however she would only ever had healthy food so i was not transitioning from an unhealthy grain filled but tasty food br it is very easy to digest and may be a solution for cats with digestion problems i recommend like another reviewer that you order a free sample and give it a try

my dogs absolutely love this i have been looking for a natural healthy food to store in my camper in case of emergency last year with all the i decided to load my camper as a quick bug out vehicle for me and my three dogs i have been sealing thier dry blue buffalo kibble but it takes up a lot of room i read a review about this dehydrated dog food from a person takes thier dog camping all time and this was the perfect solution for them and decided to give it a try my dogs let me know its time when i get home now because they are all about this food

my dogs both loved this it is easy to fix and very healthy i was already sold on the frozen raw diet for my dogs before trying this one of my dogs has several food allergies this was a healthy alternative suggested to me that i am very pleased with i tried using hot water to speed up the process for my hungry dogs and it worked extremely well definitely recommend this product

she is not a particularly food dog so i have tried lots of organic natural foods one that she consistently loves is any kind of addiction raw dehydrated food she can barely contain herself while it a bit so much so that i have started using hot water to speed the process along otherwise it is just such while she for it this dehydrated option takes up so little room compared to dealing with cans and as long as she is happy i am happy i try a different flavor everytime i order just to keep her interested so far so good

i have always wanted to go to a raw diet for my but in its frozen form it took up too much room in our fridge freezer as we travel camp a lot a friend recently told me about addiction and this is the answer for us takes up little space in our cupboard and provides a healthy diet along with a mixture of kibble and fresh fruits and vegetables that our loves he is a very happy camper the cats at home love it too we have only tried brushtail but get the venison treats for variety i am sure we will try the others too for a change up from time to time done in moderation and over a period of time so as not to upset the tummies
Original summary: great raw diet food for on the go

Review: specific flavor from the same company but i will probably use a little of this now and then as variety br br the cats coats look and feel shiny and healthy and they definitely vomit less than when fed more mainstream foods i also mixed it with some straight ground raw meat bone to make sure they were getting plenty of meat the wild brushtail certainly seems to agree with them as a protein source and there are few protein sources that do not make them sick i m limited to chicken turkey rabbit and a small amount of fish usually because the brushtail is wild it is not grain fed and thus should have plenty of the right nutrients also according to the company it is an so this is a responsible way to help the brushtail devour and the animals that live there what is not to love

i started out by purchasing the oz trial package of summer brushtail and my little girl absolutely loved it now i am getting the larger package so we do not run out my chinese suffers allergies to poultry and grains and was pretty much limited to a red meat diet since she is a variety she was on a red meat formula coated in herring oil for her skin the herring left her with fish breath all the time this is a great alternative to the fish because the richness in omega and fatty acids and no more fish breath since she has been on this her skin quality is much better this is also great to mix with kibble if you have a picky little eater like i do just mix a tbsp up in the kibble and you end up with a happy plate every time

this is really the best decaf i have tried it is hard to find any better than the italian decafs like this one or illy unless of course you are the average local coffee drinker used to like folgers or to all the and like charcoal brands named for an unknown reason french roast italian roast etc believe me they have nothing to do with french or italian coffee not to mention the local decafs which taste more like tea made out of burned wood

i am amazed how many are being so easily fooled what you are seeing is a generic ingredient list that covers multiple coffees what it is saying based on the photo i see above is that if the coffee type you have is straight coffee then all it contains is arabica coffee but if what you are drinking is a flavored coffee then the ingredients in it are arabica coffee and flavorings but if what you are drinking is a decaf variety then it contains arabica coffee that has been decaffeinated with acetate as is standard br br so if you are not holding a decaf variety then there is no decaffeinated beans it is nothing more than generic catch all ingredients that apply to variety you happen to be looking at br br think people lol
