for the best br br thankfully hawaiian hazelnut blows all of the other hazelnut k cups out of the water it is smokey and delicious without being dark and overwhelming the hazelnut really does taste like actual hazelnut which you would think would be something a coffee drinker could take for granted but we have been disappointed in the past i would never tried coffee from the wolfgang puck brand before but our positive experience with hawaiian hazelnut has definitely gotten me interested in trying other varieties br br the hazelnut flavor is pretty bold and full bodied which is nice but there is no bitterness or acidity to be found this suits me just fine since i enjoy a milder roast but people who enjoy their coffee strong and dark might not enjoy this blend as much br br we ll definitely be this coffee when we run out

Review: i use to purchase jamaica beans locally and it was great this jamaica me crazy is nothing close to it the odor is terrible and it tastes like the coffee is flat or stale other people in household tried it and could not get past the first cup pitched the remainder cups in the trash

this coffee tastes very flavorful and is not too strong but i have to say it almost ruined my months old keurig personal brewer the coffee is ground so finely that when the k cups are punctured by the needles top and bottom it gets packed into the needles and also out through the holes made by the needles going into the coffee cup creating a very nasty sludge in the bottom of each cup i purchased a pack of k cups and did not even use one full pack i do not recommend this brand or blend it is a waste of money which is something i could not really afford at this time i sent a letter of complaint to the wolfgang puck company and except for a cookie cutter letter receipt of my comment i have not received any further contact from them
Original summary: do not waste your money or your keurig on this

Review: unfortunately i am much too frugal to throw away something i have spent perfectly good money on so i am continuing to use these suckers until they are gone hopefully in a few weeks i thought i was buying a decent brand of coffee given the wolfgang puck name but alas i was wrong using the middle cup size on my keurig coffeemaker these k cups make a weak cup of coffee more like brown water no taste no nothing i switched to the smallest size cup and it is marginally better but still barely drinkable i would not serve these to guests ever i cannot wait to be done with these boxes of junk so i can order something with some taste please do not waste your money
s: not as good as i have

the brand br br so wolfgang puck got the tried different flavors this one sorrento is not my favorite of the bunch currently colombian chef reserve it has a bolder strength which i believe hard core coffee drinkers would consider medium but to me it has a simple burnt flavor to it cream and sweetener do not correct for this and thus i am a bit disappointed but again it was a in the dark br br i think if you prefer a slightly bolder slightly more burnt flavor in your coffee this may be for you i like the character of the colombian chef reserve but it is not as strong and perhaps that is just what my taste is towards i do not believe you can get a bad cup of coffee in the wolfgang puck line however cannot say the same for some other k cup brands

Review: so here is another example of a pack of k cups i bought i figured well i really enjoy sumatra bold smooth and rich with a bit of bitterness flaver so why not wolfgang puck has a few restaurants so maybe he knows coffee br br so this is utterly average in all it is not very bold or rich although i can say it does have the bitterness which is a bit as it lacks the richness purchased only because it appeared on the subscribe save at a great price per k cup that makes two wp that have been run of the mill at best sumatra french roast next time i will be more discerning

i really like to mix things up with k cups and rarely buy ct boxes of a single flavor exception to the rule would be for dark bold coffees such as french roasts which i really enjoy so when wolfgang puck french roast turned up on amazon deal of the week even though i have never tried before now i have units br br it fairly non for a french roast decent aroma but taste is compared to for example a diedrich french roast i do not hate or even dislike it it is okay and for the price i paid is acceptable without complaint it may make an acceptable guest coffee for those wanting something a little bolder without being over the top rich br br i d call it mildly bold average and i will not be going out of my way to keep it on hand

my favorite k cup so far absolutely no aftertaste which in my book is a huge plus it is not acidic not bitter just a great mild cup of coffee which is exactly what it to be i wish other people would read the description before they give a bad review based on their own do not buy a medium roast coffee and complain because it is not bold also as a general rule the ones with breakfast in the name are milder i do not care for bold dark roast slap you awake coffee so i would not buy a bold coffee and then complain that it was bold

Review: i got a k cup sample box of this coffee from and i find that it is my favorite decaf coffee it brews a smooth tasting cup of coffee every time i add some and a bit of equal and it is a treat any time br glad to have found this coffee

my wife and i have decided hands down this is our favorite k cup we have tried a lot of others and donut shop and caribu daybreak are certainly still up there however this has a very solid body flavor with a medium roast almost a bold flavor with a smooth finish excellent flavor versus strength really nice to get up on a lazy sunday morning and have a nice cup of breakfast in bed br br also i see another reviewer had problems with messy k cups i can say after about boxes of theses i have not had any issues very unfortunate for the other reviewer but looks like it was rather br br give it a try you will certainly enjoy it the wife and i sure do

who prefer a strong dark cup of coffee even at the larger mug setting should try that brand br br previously i had found the dark roast green mountain coffees rather boring but revv lives up to the hype both in strength and flavor another great green mountain coffee is their espresso blend though amazon does not stock it so the prices tend to be higher here than in brick and mortar stores such as bed bath and beyond finally a favorite regular over the years has been a href http www amazon com gp product b m w yq emeril big easy bold a it is a very nice coffee though do not expect the new orleans experience of chicory flavor br br bottom line you will not go wrong with the wolfgang puck coffees but for my taste they do not stand out among the available bold coffees

i am usually a non flavored coffee drinker but i do like to mix things up every now and again this is a lightly coconut flavored coffee the coffee itself is a medium brew and it goes well with the tropical of the coconut it is a nice summer drink
i love quite a few coffees but this one is grabbing my whole attention it is not bitter but it is not light either it is perfect i love it

Review: of this freshly made joe the smell would really tempt me to go back to consuming coffee again eventually it broke me down and i am back to being a full time coffee drinker and proud of it imagine how happy i was to find my favorite brew in a k cup the only thing better than a cup of me crazy is a cup sweetened with the new almond joy flavor international creamer in it to highlight the sweet coconut unfortunately we only have a keurig at our office i m in real estate now so i have to go to work to enjoy a cup i am thinking i have a brilliant boss who knows how to get people to willingly show up to work now if i can just figure a way to use it to temp more buyers into our office i would have it made

i bought this grudgingly because my favorite timothy italian blend was out of stock and i was very happily surprised it is not as big and winey a brew as my favorite but was flavorful had a delicious aroma and was smooth i tend to like rather potent coffee but i have clients who prefer a little lighter cup this will be perfect i will happily keep buying this coffee thanks wolfgang

i think this is a love it or hate it kind of coffee i love it the flavor starts out similar to butter toffee but then sort of into coconut pineapple and rum i think it is delicious and unique and i do not ever want to be without some in my cupboard

this one will not disappoint i got this yesterday and my husband and i tried it this morning with breakfast and we both loved it i have gotten many different kinds of the k cups to try but after trying this one i think i could be happy with just this one and black tiger for those mornings when i want a really strong cup of coffee the rodeo drive blend is delicious with a nice round feel on the palate and an interesting flavor on the finish with just a hint of smokiness perfectly balanced and absolutely wonderful plus i have to admit i love the label the different color looks very appealing on my with the other k cups
we have tried many of the k cups that are available and this is in our top we prefer a darker bolder flavor and this one hits the mark at the same time it is quite smooth

Review: i purchased this for my wife birthday dinner i never tried this brand of before it was delicious the sausage was excellent the duck was good the general flavor was superb

of the highest quality my cats cannot get enough of it and the price is very competitive especially if you are a prime member br br still in doubt try this test br br open a can of your current cat food and smell it then compare that to any flavor of merrick it will not turn your stomach br br when it says fish there are huge chunks of you guessed it fish not a weird looking grey or stinky brown paste that you could mistake for what comes out the other end but actual food in a can speaking of which the post meal litter box period is reduced as well as is volume less to clean br br give it a try remember to mix it with your old food for a day to two to ease the transition but your cats will thank you for it

my cats are more enthusiastic about turducken than just about any other cat food they literally lick the plate clean even my who usually just gives me manages to out an audible meow when i start putting this on a plate the ingredients are much higher quality than many brands too no by products corn etc i will be ordering more
licorice has no flavor very hard to eat it was in a seal bag but it hard not soft like other licorice

good coffee however i have been disappointed with the senseo coffee pods that are made in by douwe egberts the pods are not individually wrapped and the coffee often does not taste fresh the pods also contain too little coffee which results in a weak watery brew the flavored senseo french vanilla caramel bistro coffee pods seem to me to be better than most senseo blends that i have tried in general i prefer to buy pods from timothy world coffee the timothy pods contain almost twice as much coffee as the senseo pods and the resulting coffee is superior in my view i have found that the timothy pods will work well in the senseo machine if the pod is and before the lid i use the single pod holder and make a ounce cup if you must use the senseo pods made by douwe egberts try this blend

coffee pods used to be sold in safeway and target etc stores in my area in the last year the pods have not been stocked in favor of the new single brewer style k cup while i can locate many sources on the internet i have found that quickest delivery at a reasonable price is buying senseo from amazon br mostly a french vanilla drinker i find the taste is the packages keep fresh for months i typically buy pods per order the pods work very well in my bunn coffee maker tea brewer single serve i wish every item i purchased was as easy reliable and quick as these coffee pods

these pods are rather bland i purchased them because i thought they would make a nice dessert coffee they do not taste much different than regular coffee pods i would not purchase them again nor do i recommend them

i purchased these pods using amazon subscribe and save program for the first time this year the order was received promptly and the pods were fresh and very flavorful i have used this flavor coffee pods since january and have not been disappointed ever hopefully i will be able to continue receiving them from amazon

Review: after doing a ton of research and reading about coffee i finally broke down and purchased this for my birthday just to give it a shot at first i was not impressed thinking that i just for some upgraded folgers but then i figured it out the secret to this coffee is making it in smaller batches at first i was making cups at a time in my small coffee pot then i cut that back to a two cup using approx tablespoons of freshly ground coffee it was amazing the depth and natural sweetness of this coffee were unbelievable definitely something worth trying at least once i for one will be looking forward to the next time i can justify purchasing this special occasion coffee

i thought that i should post a review in response to bad cat we ordered off the same batch for the same holiday reasons and had no effects the coffee was great there was no tart aftertaste no matter how strong you brew it the only reason that i gave it only four stars is that i would personally of liked a litter darker roast i just wanted to say that we drank off the same lot as bad cat in the same year christmas eve and christmas with zero headaches or ill it just might have been something else
s: not as good as it is

Review: absolutely hate beer sour candy and some red i let the pill dissolve on my tongue and started out trying a lemon one thing i recommend which i did not do was to try out all the food first to get something to compare it to i sat in front of my boyfriend and ate a whole lemon without even then i told him to try it and he could barely lick it without making a face then i tried some beer it tasted like cold coffee with a hint of i eventually got him to take one of the pills we had sooo much fun tasting foods it was amazing how much it worked i already recommended it to all my friends and now i recommend it to you it can be a really cool party trick by someone you can eat a whole lemon without making a face

Review: to taste the results i have used this brand several times and it seems to be pretty consistent in it is effectiveness and quality the best way i can describe the effect of these tabs is it makes a lemon taste like a lemon shake up from a fair it does not create a super candy like sweetness which i think would be really weird anyway there is still a hint of sour behind the sweet taste also they do not last anywhere near an hour more like min so just be warned and be ready to taste things immediately after dissolving the pill in your mouth in my experience there have been a percentage of people for whom the tabs are not effective maybe between in a group people per the tabs are somewhat expensive but as a pretty unique experience i definitely recommend trying it at least once
s: not bad but not as good as it is

Review: i just did a test run for a work party and i sampled raspberries strawberries lemons limes tabasco sauce goats cheese beer orange juice and yogurt first off the lemon was the best tasting example of fruit i have ever had in my life i wanted to eat the whole thing the rest of the fruits tasted delicious the unsweetened yogurt was good the orange juice amazing and the beer much sweeter the goats cheese didnt taste that yummy to me and the tabasco sauce didnt have a noticeable change in flavor over all a very fun and effective flavor changing experience

it does change the way you taste but not to such a great effect that you are expecting it is more of a pleasant surprise and not a omg surprise it makes sour and most fruits sweeter it makes beer taste like some sort of sugary juice and i do not like beer i would like to try cream cheese and wine which are supposed to be yummy i recommend this product and i only need a half a tablet to last about min to an hour i would not dare try spicy foods as they suggest on the package but they suggest pineapple cheese peppers and limes lemon in water tasted like lemonade with tons of sugar i would and see how it works out for you it does not work on all foods though like potatoes or meats as it mostly your sour or tart taste buds

s: not as good as it is

compared with truvia or other stevia plus other sweetener products it is considerably less expensive and the taste is pure not multi layered if you want to enhance the flavor and it does not with your diet regimen consider adding a squirt of honey or a dash of table sugar to your beverage i am looking forward to a hot cocoa recipe chocolate and cocoa seem to mask flavors very effectively i am not sure how to use stevia for baking that will take some experimentation and most likely require combining stevia with other wholesome sweeteners br in all i have only tried truvia once in tea and i found that it had an almost effect on my tongue and considerably less sweetness than stevia many sweeteners come in single serving packets and as a result they are considerably more expensive per serving why not start with a pure product

vegan and take my nutrition very seriously all the hype about what a chia seeds were i figured this was just the next new thing i did some research looked at the nutritional benefits and facts and figured if i hated them it would not be too long until i finished the pouch i make cream of wheat in the morning with a tablespoon of flaxseeds one cup of almond milk one cup water and tablespoons of a nut mixture i made of raw almonds cashews walnuts dried blueberries cranberries and golden raisins i make it loose so i feel fuller longer the chia seeds let me keep the volume of breakfast without adding too many calories now my cream of wheat is not so soup like and it has extra fiber protein and the good fats i am pleased with this product and am going to to use it

flax seeds br br upon arrival i opted to use these in my salad as opposed to the flax seeds i have been using br br the chia seeds caused the most horrible and painful bloating i ever experienced granted i did use the full serving size but since then i lowered the amount and still with even just a quarter of a teaspoon or less i get the bloating br br i have since switched back to the flax seeds which did not on my intestinal tract br br i am hoping i can find some way to use these seeds in the future because i hate seeing anything go to waste br br my advice if you are set on trying the chia seeds is to start out with a very low amount and stick with that low amount until your stomach up a tolerance for these seeds
Original summary: dont use too much in one meal
